from FigureÂ [airport-pddl-algorithm](#/), what are all the
applicable concrete instances of ${Fly}(p,{from},{to})$ in the
state described by

$$
At(P_1,JFK) \land At(P_2,SFO) \land Plane(P_1) \land Plane(P_2) \land Airport(JFK) \land Airport(SFO)?
